mapper.select: SELECT B.BOARD_NO, B.BOARD_CODE, B.BOARD_TITLE, B.BOARD_CONTENT, B.BOARD_WRITE_DATE, B.READ_COUNT, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON B.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO WHERE B.BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' AND B.BOARD_CODE = 2
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPORT_BOARD RB JOIN BOARD B ON RB.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO JOIN MEMBER M ON B.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO WHERE B.BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' AND B.BOARD_CODE = 2

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY B.BOARD_NO ASC) AS "RNUM", B.BOARD_TITLE, RC.REPORT_CATEGORY_CONTENT, R.REPORT_WRITE_DATE, R.REPORT_CATEGORY AS REPORT_CATEGORY, M2.MEMBER_NICKNAME AS REPORT_NICKNAME, R.BOARD_NO FROM "BOARD" B JOIN "BOARD_TYPE" BT ON (B.BOARD_CODE = BT.BOARD_CODE) JOIN "REPORT_BOARD" R ON (B.BOARD_NO = R.BOARD_NO) JOIN "MEMBER" M ON (M.MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO) JOIN "REPORT_CATEGORY" RC ON (RC.REPORT_CATEGORY = R.REPORT_CATEGORY) JOIN "MEMBER" M2 ON (M2.MEMBER_NO = R.MEMBER_NO) -- 신고한 회원의 닉네임 WHERE B.BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' AND B.BOARD_CODE = 2 ORDER BY RNUM DESC
